The life and death of Sir Matthew Hale, Knt. late Lord Chief Justice of England. Containing many pious and moral rules for humane conversation. : Also, many remarkable sayings and worthy actions of the said lord chief justice. : And many other things worth the readers perusal. / Written originally by Dr. Gilbert Burnet, now Bishop of Salisbury. Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
16 p. : port.
Printed and sold by J. Bradford at the Bible in Fetter-Lane, London : [ca. 1700]
Date of publication suggested by Wing. Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
